Improvements.Improvement: Replace anonymous classes with lambda expressions
Improvements.Description: Java 8 introduced lambda expressions to provide a clear and concise way to represent one method interface using an expression. It provides a clear and compact way to define anonymous classes/methods.

Improvements.Improvement: Extract repeated code to a separate method
Improvements.Description: The code inside both the for loops is almost identical. It can be extracted into a separate method to improve readability and maintainability.
